long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📹 Video Downloader for Chrome. Downloads video to your computer. Supports embedded videos. MEOVI Video Downloader for Chrome.

❓ Don't know how to download video from popular video hosting to your computer?
✅ MEOVI Video Downloader allows you to download any Videos from the hosting directly to your PC. You can easily download any video you want to save by clicking Download button on the video itself.

Downloader features:
🔹 Download any video directly from video hosting website
🔹 Download any embedded video from any website

My extension is simple and fast tool for downloading video. All you need is to click the button, chose video resolution and MEOVI Video Downloader will do the rest.

How to Download any video from Vimeo:
1️⃣ Add MEOVI Video Downloader to your Browser
2️⃣ Update your current video hosting page. You will see download buttons on the video and next to the video description.
3️⃣ Click download button, choose desired video resolution, after that downloading will start immediately.

After clicking Download a window with resolution options appears.
🎥 You can download video from any website where it is embedded.

Nota Bene:
This extension is an independent project, not affiliated with Vimeo.
